#+end_src

* Symbolic

#+begin_src python :kernel sagemath :exports both
var("X,q_0,N")
h = 4
u = 2
f_ = []
for i in range(h):
    if i < u:
        f_.append(N^(u-i) * (q_0 + x)^i)
    else:
        f_.append(x^(i-u) * (q_0 + x)^u)
    print(latex(f_[-1].expand()))
#+end_src

#+RESULTS:
: N^{2}
: N q_{0} + N x
: q_{0}^{2} + 2 \, q_{0} x + x^{2}
: q_{0}^{2} x + 2 \, q_{0} x^{2} + x^{3}
